Smartwatches

Apple Watch

Apple Watch is a line of smartwatches developed, designed, and marketed by Apple Inc. It incorporates fitness tracking and health-oriented capabilities with integration with iOS and other Apple products and services. The original generation of the device was available in four variants: Apple Watch Sport, Apple Watch, Apple Watch Hermès, and Apple Watch Edition; each distinguished by different combinations of cases and first- or third-party interchangeable bands.

Apple Watch Series 3 - Technical Specifications
  • Faster dual-core processor
  • Built-in GPS and GLONASS
  • Accelerometer
  • Gyroscope
  • Wi-Fi (802.11b/g/n 2.4GHz)
  • Bluetooth 4.2
  • Up to 18 hours
  • Second-generation OLED Retina display with Force Touch

Apple Watch Models (Series)

  • Apple Watch (2015–2016)
  • Apple Watch Series 1 (2016–present)
  • Apple Watch Series 2 (2016–2017)
  • Apple Watch Series 3 (2017–present)
